instructions:
Arrange potato slices in a well greased 11 x 7 x 2 inch baking dish; sprinkle with green onions. Pour water
over potatoes and onions. Salt and pepper, and arrange bacon slices on top. Cover and cook in 400 F oven
for 35 minutes. Uncover and cook until potatoes are tender and bacon is slightly crisp, about 15 minutes
longer.
name: Oven-fried Potatoes With Bacon
